name: Vendor outreach - no meta commentary
description: Real failure: Agent narrated 'This is a vendor/partnership outreach email'

trigger.subject: Improved paid collab proposal for Pippit AI
trigger.body:
Hi Matt,

We're Pippit AI and we'd love to sponsor some of your content. We have an improved offer for you.

Can we schedule a quick call?

Best,
Aha Agency
